description: A flat piece of plastic that finishes the construction of a magazine.  This one is for the magazines of the Glock brand.  Can be attached to a Glock magazine body to make it a usable magazine.

variants.description: A flat piece of plastic that prevents the magazine spring from falling out.  This one is an original base plate from Glock, and comes standard with the magazines of the brand.  Can be attached to Glock magazine bodies to finalize it into a usable magazine.  <variant:black>

notes: trim is to account for both the curved edges and the interior space
the latter becomes apparent from images in the height source

//notes: the source for weight and dimensions looks shady but also offers the best values
it's clear that took original values from a different source, but we were unable to find it
to avoid potentially harming players' and modders' computers, we refuse to link the source for those
a better, linkable source would be much appreciated
description: A small, cube-ish plastic cup that finishes the construction of a magazine.  This one is for the magazines of the Glock brand.  Can be attached to a Glock magazine body to make an extended magazine.

variants.description: Glock's own extension plate for their magazines.  Extends the length of the magazine and adds 2 extra rounds to its capacity.  <variant:black>

notes: trim is to account for both the curved edges and the interior space

//notes: different sources list different weights per extension, with most of them citing 0.3 lbs = 136.08 g
X-Ray Parts and Rifle Mags list 200 g and 199 g, respectively
we rely on the weight in source until a more definitely value is found
description: A plastic tower as tall as a Glock magazine.  Originally developed to fit SMGs that accept Glock magazines, to accomodate an SMG's increased fire rate relative to its magazine capacity.  Can be attached to a Glock magazine body to make a significantly more extended magazine.

variants.description: A tall magazine extension for 9x19mm Glock magazines, intended to augment their capacity for a better fit with the Vector SMGs.  <variant:black>

//weight: we presume the weight listed is per a 3-pack of extensions
